item.title: MongoDB and PHP, The Book
item.description: <img src="/media/MongoDBandPHP-Book.jpg" alt="MongoDB and PHP" /> I wrote a book. It is published by O’Reilly, and available now on Amazon, O’Reilly Media and a bunch of other sites, available in both print and as an ebook. From the introduction: What would happen if you optimized a data store for the operations application developers actually use? You’d arrive at MongoDB, the reliable document-oriented database. With this concise guide, you’ll learn how to build elegant database applications with MongoDB and PHP.
